title: Phase 2: Codex agent type
description: Add Codex adapter implementing the AgentAdapter interface. Build codex/ adapter with OtelServer collector using Codex-specific OTEL event parsing. Implement Codex agent launch with -c flag for OTEL endpoint config and CODEX_HOME for isolated state. Map Codex OTEL events (codex.conversation_starts, codex.tool_decision, codex.tool_result, codex.sse_event, etc.) to normalized AgentEvents. Integrate PTYInputSender for reverse direction.
